description.full: What is your goal? To stand on your own field of dreams? Or to be remembered as a legend? After achieving global sales of 47 million copies, the latest installation of "Pro Evolution Soccer" returns packed with new features taking gaming reality to a whole new level!! "PES 2009" features the all new "Legend Mode" a perfect mode for all of you who may be new to the genre as well as the much coveted "UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE MODE", the greatest club competition in all of Europe. Here is where it all starts!! On your Xbox360!!
